task_desc: Determine which of two sentences is sarcastic

1.input:
(a) You can still achieve the American Dream after working at Walmart. (b) You can still achieve the American Dream of working at Walmart.
Choices:
A. (a)
B. (b)

2.input:
(a) We should start a petition to ban breathing. (b) We should start a petition to ban vaping.
Choices:
A. (a)
B. (b)

3.input:
(a) Anyone can be successful without having inherited all their money first. (b) Nobody can be successful without having inherited all their money first.
Choices:
A. (a)
B. (b)

4.input:
(a) I personally don't believe the 7 time felon that just got done murdering a random woman wouldn't lie. (b) I personally don't believe the 7 time felon that just got done murdering a random woman would lie.
Choices:
A. (a)
B. (b)

5.input:
(a) Yeah, let's crucify this nonprofit for making money, they shouldn't be doing that. (b) Yeah, let's crucify this company for making money, they shouldn't be doing that.
Choices:
A. (a)
B. (b)

6.input:
(a) Protein supplements are way more expensive than $1 breakfast gruel. (b) Protein supplements are way more expensive than $1 breakfast burritos.
Choices:
A. (a)
B. (b)

7.input:
(a) He doesn't want high risk investment? He should put it all on bitcoin! (b) He doesn't want low risk investment? He should put it all on bitcoin!
Choices:
A. (a)
B. (b)

8.input:
(a) One of my least-favorite things to do working was taking out and smelling the trash. (b) One of my favorite things to do working was taking out and smelling the trash.
Choices:
A. (a)
B. (b)

9.input:
(a) Yeah, I've noticed he's been drinking every day recently, what a great transformation (b) Yeah, I've noticed he's been exercising every day recently, what a great transformation
Choices:
A. (a)
B. (b)

10.input:

A. (a)
B. (b)

A. (a)
B. (b)

A. (a)
B. (b)

13.input:
(a) Yes, because having interests and actively researching them is a huge waste. (b) Yes, because having interests and actively researching them is a huge deal.
Choices:
A. (a)
B. (b)

14.input:
(a) I'll just bring my keyboard and mouse to the computer and plug it all in. (b) I'll just bring my keyboard and mouse to the bus and plug it all in.
Choices:
A. (a)
B. (b)

A. (a)

18.input:

Choices:

19.input:

20.input:

B. (b)

Choices:
A. (a)
B. (b)
